title: Rose War
overview: Gu Nian was a full-time housewife leading a happy life until her husband becomes involved in a criminal case and gets exposed for infidelity. Gu Nian's husband, Song Jia Chen, is a successful lawyer and their family of three lived happily. However, everything changes when Song Jia Chen was not only embroiled in a crime but also caught cheating on her. Gu Nian finds work at a law firm through Feng Sheng's referral and attempts to start over.Â
